categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Nolin Reevas was a male Human who was a Sith Inquisitor of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. During the invasion of the planet Taris, he was stationed at the Toxic Lake Garrison.
Nolin Reevas first appeared in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare as the Sith Inquisitor class trainer on Taris.
